game.shortDescription: 전설적인 미국 트럭을 경험하고 햇살 가득한 캘리포니아, 모래가 많은 네바다, 애리조나주의 그랜드 캐니언 전역에서 다양한 화물을 배달하세요. American Truck Simulator는 숨 막힐 듯한 풍경과 미국 전역의 널리 알려진 랜드마크를 여행으로 안내합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience legendary American trucks and deliver various cargoes across sunny California, sandy Nevada, and the Grand Canyon State of Arizona. American Truck Simulator takes you on a journey through the breathtaking landscapes and widely recognized landmarks around the States.

reviewHighlights.text: I first discovered American Truck Simulator in January 2017, playing on a simple G29 wheel mounted to a desk. Later that same year, in September 2017,...
This is my wake-up game I load up in the morning on days off. Wake up, hydrate, put on some music, drive a bit, then go about the rest of my day.
